name: $standardSequence
desc: Returns: Gold standard sequence used for comparing against.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Gold standard sequence used for comparing against.

name: $start
desc: Returns: Start position of the sequence. If the coordinate system is either 0-based or 1-based, then start position is inclusive.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Start position of the sequence. If the coordinate system is either 0-based or 1-based, then start position is inclusive.

name: $end
desc: Returns: End position of the sequence. If the coordinate system is 0-based then end is exclusive and does not include the last position. If the coordinate system is 1-base, then end is inclusive and includes the last position.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: End position of the sequence. If the coordinate system is 0-based then end is exclusive and does not include the last position. If the coordinate system is 1-base, then end is inclusive and includes the last position.

name: $score
desc: Returns: The score of an experimentally derived feature such as a p-value ([SO:0001685](http://www.sequenceontology.org/browser/current_svn/term/SO:0001685)).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The score of an experimentally derived feature such as a p-value ([SO:0001685](http://www.sequenceontology.org/browser/current_svn/term/SO:0001685)).

name: $method
desc: Returns: Which method is used to get sequence quality.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Which method is used to get sequence quality.

name: $truthTP
desc: Returns: True positives, from the perspective of the truth data, i.e. the number of sites in the Truth Call Set for which there are paths through the Query Call Set that are consistent with all of the alleles at this site, and for which there is an accurate genotype call for the event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: True positives, from the perspective of the truth data, i.e. the number of sites in the Truth Call Set for which there are paths through the Query Call Set that are consistent with all of the alleles at this site, and for which there is an accurate genoty

name: $queryTP
desc: Returns: True positives, from the perspective of the query data, i.e. the number of sites in the Query Call Set for which there are paths through the Truth Call Set that are consistent with all of the alleles at this site, and for which there is an accurate genotype call for the event.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: True positives, from the perspective of the query data, i.e. the number of sites in the Query Call Set for which there are paths through the Truth Call Set that are consistent with all of the alleles at this site, and for which there is an accurate genoty

name: $truthFN
desc: Returns: False negatives, i.e. the number of sites in the Truth Call Set for which there is no path through the Query Call Set that is consistent with all of the alleles at this site, or sites for which there is an inaccurate genotype call for the event. Sites with correct variant but incorrect genotype are counted here.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: False negatives, i.e. the number of sites in the Truth Call Set for which there is no path through the Query Call Set that is consistent with all of the alleles at this site, or sites for which there is an inaccurate genotype call for the event. Sites wit

name: $queryFP
desc: Returns: False positives, i.e. the number of sites in the Query Call Set for which there is no path through the Truth Call Set that is consistent with this site. Sites with correct variant but incorrect genotype are counted here.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: False positives, i.e. the number of sites in the Query Call Set for which there is no path through the Truth Call Set that is consistent with this site. Sites with correct variant but incorrect genotype are counted here.

name: $gtFP
desc: Returns: The number of false positives where the non-REF alleles in the Truth and Query Call Sets match (i.e. cases where the truth is 1/1 and the query is 0/1 or similar).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The number of false positives where the non-REF alleles in the Truth and Query Call Sets match (i.e. cases where the truth is 1/1 and the query is 0/1 or similar).

name: $fScore
desc: Returns: Harmonic mean of Recall and Precision, computed as: 2 * precision * recall / (precision + recall).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Harmonic mean of Recall and Precision, computed as: 2 * precision * recall / (precision + recall).

name: $roc
desc: Returns: Receiver Operator Characteristic (ROC) Curve  to give sensitivity/specificity tradeoff.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Receiver Operator Characteristic (ROC) Curve  to give sensitivity/specificity tradeoff.
